Email_Subject: Experienced Café Staff – Ready to Support Sales Targets
Email_Body:
Dear Copper + Straw Speciality Coffee,

I hope you're doing well.

My name is Sreesha, and I am writing to express my interest in a part-time opportunity at Copper + Straw Speciality Coffee.

I have previous experience working in cafés in India, where I developed strong customer service, sales, and teamwork skills.

In my previous roles, I was responsible for assisting customers, handling billing, managing orders efficiently during peak hours, maintaining cleanliness standards, and contributing to daily sales targets. Working in a fast-paced environment has helped me build excellent communication skills, patience, and the ability to handle pressure professionally.

I am confident that I can add value to your team by:
- Providing friendly and professional customer service
- Supporting the team in achieving sales targets
- Maintaining high hygiene and presentation standards
- Handling cash and POS systems responsibly
- Contributing positively to team coordination

I am available on both weekdays and weekends, including early morning or late evening shifts if required. I am flexible, quick to learn, and always willing to take initiative when needed.

I would truly appreciate the opportunity to contribute to your team and grow within your organization. I look forward to the possibility of discussing this further.

Best regards,
Sreesha
+353 831096848
mulasreesha@gmail.com
